testsuite.name: GuessAnimalTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
The program should clarify if the statement is correct for a dog. Expected find: "is .+ correct for a dog?" Actual data is: "is the statement correct for the dog?".
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -type yaml
stdout: Scenario 'en' is started.
Hello!
I want to learn about animals. Which animal do you like most? > cat Welcome to the animals expert system!
What do you want to do:
1. Play the guessing game 2. List of all animals 3. Search for an animal 4. Calculate statistics 5. Delete an animal 6. Print the Knowledge Tree 0. Exit > 1 You think of an animal, and I guess it. Press enter when youre ready. > Is it a cat? > No I give up. What animal do you have in mind? > dog Specify a fact that distinguishes a dog from a cat: The sentence should be of the format: It can/has/is .... > it can climb trees Is the statement correct for the dog?
